articles.title: Trump administration unveils a plan to modernize the air traffic control system - NPR
articles.description: The transportation secretary announced a far-reaching plan to drastically overhaul the current technology used by thousands of controllers responsible for guiding planes in and out of airports.
articles.content: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy says he wants a full modernization of the nation's antiquated air traffic control system within four years. On Thursday, he announced a far-reaching, estimated mul… [+7924 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: A Soviet-era spacecraft built to land on Venus is falling to Earth instead - Ars Technica
articles.description: Kosmos 482 is encased in a titanium heat shield, with a good chance of reaching the surface intact.
